Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found on a beach alonside the pipe which was presumably used to beat her.

> in the early hours of Monday, April 7, 2014 winesses found the body of a [trans woman] with bruises on her body on Praia do Sobral in front of BOPE and the Fire Department of Maceió.
>
> She is unidentified and appears to be between 25 and 27 years old. She was wearing denim shorts and a red tank top with a bra.
>
> The IC and IML attended the scene and did not find significant perforations that would lead to believe that there were shots or stab wounds. The bruises are apparently from blows. A pipe was found with the [trans woman's body].

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & Portal Alarde 07.04.2014

Name: Çağla Joker
Description:
Çağla and her roommate Nalan were shot by two clients after they discovered she was trans. Nalan survived, but Çağla unfortunately did not.

The attack took place at in their apartment on Daracik Street in the Beyoglu Kamer Hatun neighborhood.

> Trans women Çağla Joker and Nalan were attacked with a gun on the night of 20 April in Tarlabaşı, and 25-year-old Çağla Joker, who was shot in the chest, died at the scene. HT, who was put on trial for 16 years due to his age reduction being 17 years old, said in his statement at the court,  “We met two people we thought were women. We bargained. [She] said [she] was [trans]. I wanted my money back. [She] cursed heavily, saying that [she] would not return the money.”

TvT partner organization Red Umbrella

https://www.diken.com.tr/cagla-jokerin-katil-zanlisina-yas-indiriminden-sonra-bir-de-haksiz-tahrik-indirimi/

https://m.bianet.org/bianet/lgbti/155153-trans-seks-iscisiysen-oldurulmek-hayatin-bir-parcasi
Tweet:
Çağla and her roommate Nalan were shot by two clients in Istanbul (Turkey) on 20 Apr 2014 after they discovered she was trans. Nalan survived, but Çağla died from her injuries.

Çağla was 25. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Bhrenda Scarpelin
Description:
Bhrenda's body was found on the Pinheirinho road in Parque Macedo in Itaquaquecetuba on 21st April. Her cause of death is unknown.

Bhrenda's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/bhrenda.scarpelin.

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & Don Gustavo Blog 24.04.2014

Name: Joahana Jiménez Mateus
Description:
Johanna was stabbed in her salon in the Isla Trinitaria area of Guayaquil. Her murderer was later arrested.

> The Silhouette X Association, rejects the murder of John Orlando Jiménez Mateus (Johanna) brutally murdered in her hairdresser (Source Noticiero TC Televisión: http://www.tctelevision.com/elnoticiero/asesinaron-estilista-sur-guayaquil) in a cooperative from Isla Trinitaria south of Guayaquil - Ecuador.
>
> She was 47 years old when the attacker ended her life on Monday, April 21, 2014 at 07:00 am, being (as in most cases) known to the victim.
>
> According to the prosecutor Roque Macías, the murderer has been captured who has entered into investigations by the Police.
>
> We call on the authorities to investigate the murder and that this time they have obtained an alleged suspect. This shows once again the exposure to which trans people are in Ecuador.

TvT partner organization: Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans

https://siluetax.org/2014/04/27/asesinan-a-estilista-4ta-del-2014-murdered-stylist-trans-4th-of-2014/

https://web.archive.org/web/20150411102341/http://www.tctelevision.com/elnoticiero/asesinaron-estilista-sur-guayaquil

Name: Tábora Anduray
Description:
Tábora was shot in the street.

> [Deadname] Tábora Anduray (19) was shot dead this Sunday on avenida 5 in the Lempira neighborhood of San Pedro Sula.
>
>Relatives of the trans woman who went to Forensic Medicine to claim the body, said that Tábora Anduray was [trans] and that they arrived from Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara to Cofradía to visit some friends.
>
> They indicated that the victim left from Cofradía with two other friends. The three persons were 'hit'' by two men driving a gray van without license plates.

TvT partner organization: Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans
